definitions.definition: an instrument for writing or drawing, consisting of a thin stick of graphite or a similar substance enclosed in a long thin piece of wood or fixed in a metal or plastic case.
examples: lead pencil, mechanical pencil, colored pencil; Moregrease pencil; eyebrow pencil, lip pencil "a sharpened pencil"Moregrease pencil; eyebrow pencil, lip pencil a sharpened pencil

definitions.definition: graphite or a similar substance used as a medium for writing or drawing.
examples: the words were scribbled in pencil

definitions.definition: a cosmetic in a long thin stick, designed to be applied to a particular part of the face.
synonyms: colored pencil; Moregrease pencil; eyebrow pencil

definitions.definition: something with the shape of a pencil.
a set of light rays, lines, etc., converging to or diverging narrowly from a single point.
write, draw, or color (something) with a pencil.
examples: a previous owner has penciled their name inside the cover
synonyms: take down More"he penciled his name inside the cover"draw
sketch "pencil a line along the top of the molding"
